t: A Song{H7892} of degrees{H4609}. Blessed{H835} is every one that feareth{H3373} the LORD{H3068}; that walketh{H1980}{(H8802)} in his ways{H1870}.
For thou shalt eat{H398}{(H8799)} the labour{H3018} of thine hands{H3709}: happy{H835} shalt thou be, and it shall be well{H2896} with thee.
Thy wife{H802} shall be as a fruitful{H6509}{(H8802)} vine{H1612} by the sides{H3411} of thine house{H1004}: thy children{H1121} like olive{H2132} plants{H8363} round about{H5439} thy table{H7979}.
Behold, that thus shall the man{H1397} be blessed{H1288}{(H8792)} that feareth{H3373} the LORD{H3068}.
The LORD{H3068} shall bless{H1288}{(H8762)} thee out of Zion{H6726}: and thou shalt see{H7200}{(H8798)} the good{H2898} of Jerusalem{H3389} all the days{H3117} of thy life{H2416}.
Yea, thou shalt see{H7200}{(H8798)} thy children's{H1121} children{H1121}, and peace{H7965} upon Israel{H3478}.
